answers.answer: How far along are you? Close to the second trimester, your body starts producing more blood. The increased blood volume starts earlier and can cause dizziness and hot flashes.
I keep feeling like I'm going to throw up but I've been sipping water trying to keep it down. I'm 38 weeks  3 days if it helps.
Hmmm. I was.induced at 37+2 with my son so I'm not positive, but have you tried eating crackers or something? I know I'd get sick and dizzy when I didn't eat every 6 hours.
How's your iron levels? If too low it could cause dizziness.

I had some bacon and eggs this morning already. My fiancee always makes me eat breakfast before he goes to work because I won't eat if he doesn't, I hate eating in the morning. And I took my prenatals already this morning too. I've been up since 5 because my fiancee goes to work at 6.
Blood pressure, blood sugar, or flu. If i were you i'd go to the doctors to make sure you don't have pre eclamsia.
You might want to call your dr then. I'm not sure if that's normal or not. I know dizziness can be a side effect of preeclampsia.
I have an appointment this evening, should I call and try to get an earlier one or do you think it will be okay to go in at my scheduled time which is 7?
Bump. I need to know if I should go in sooner or if me going in at 7 will be okay. I've got a really bad headache now too.
Call your doc and ask!

You need to go in now. A headache is a big sign of preeclampsia. If that is what you have and its bad enough you can have a stroke if not treated right away. Very dangerous. I would skip the doctor go straight to thER. Good luck and hope you feel better soon!
Alright, thank you very much. I didn't know it could be that serious, I'm getting dressed and going right now.

I got this once, it ended up being hypoglycemia, just a moment of it, nothing to worry about, but this close to your due date it's better to get it checked and make sure it's nothing serious like preeclampsia.
Yes, I'm sorry I didn't mean to scare you but when you said bad headache my mind went to that right away. I sure hope it is something more harmless but best to get it checked asap.

So I went up to the hospital and they didn't even run any tests, just took my temp listened to my chest and did my blood pressure. And out of that they got that I had a cold and upper restpatory  infection. Which makes no sense to me because neither of those explains why I am so dizzy and shaky. And I haven't been coughing. They told me there was nothing I can take.
Call now
I would call ur Dr and ask him/her what u should do
Did you go to the emergency room, or L&D.....sounds like you had a bad time with the emergency room....L&D should have done something, urine, fetal monitoring, leg reflexe ect....
Ya id def call dr
If your bp was okay its nor preclampsia. But make sure your dr knows tonight.
My  SIL who's around 30 wks was having similar symptoms ob told her she had vertigo (inner ear infection/inflammation) gave her anti nausea meds and had her drink plenty of fluids with rest.

question: I am so dizzy right now I can bearly type this. I can't even stand up right now. I'm extremely hot too, im literally drenched in sweat and im laying in front of the fan. Why am I feeling like this?
title: Help! What could be causing this?
